description: a(n) = b(n) + d(n), where b(n) = (n-th Lucas number > 3) and d(n) = (n-th number that is 1 or is not a Fibonacci number).
formula: a(n) = phi^(n+2) + n + log_phi(n) + O(1). [_Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jan 17 2012]
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: a(28)-a(37) corrected by Harvey P. Dale, Jan 17 2012
